A imagem mostra um homem adulto (Wagner Moura) em um evento formal, cercado por pessoas elegantemente vestidas e por equipamentos de imprensa. Ele veste um terno claro e fala com um repórter, segurando no primeiro plano um pequeno cartão ilustrado, semelhante a um santinho religioso, com a figura de uma pessoa estilizada com auréola e cores vibrantes ao fundo. Ele o exibe de modo destacado, aproximando-o da câmera.

O ambiente é bem iluminado, com refletores e câmeras ao redor, indicando uma cobertura jornalística. O homem parece descontraído e receptivo, com expressão leve enquanto fala ao microfone. A atmosfera geral transmite o clima de tapete vermelho ou de uma premiação, com profissionais da mídia circulando e convidados em trajes formais.

Trust Indian, not foreign voices: Goyal on BTA with US – The Times of India

NEW DELHI: Days after govt rejected US commerce secretary Howard Lutnick's claims, commerce and industry minister Piyush Goyal Sunday said that stakeholders should have trust in India, instead of relying on statements from…

external.description: NEW DELHI: Days after govt rejected US commerce secretary Howard Lutnick's claims, commerce and industry minister Piyush Goyal Sunday said that stakeholders should have trust in India, instead of relying on statements from overseas. "Trade deal is not negotiated in media. Trust India, don't trust foreign statements. Have trust in your country, your motherland, India," he said at an event when asked about the state of play on the bilateral trade deal. Last week, Lutnick had claimed that the India-US trade deal, which has been in the works since last Feb, did not go through as PM Narendra Modi did not call US President Donald Trump, unlike leaders from some other countries which managed to get lower tariffs as against 50% slapped on India.
external.title: Trust Indian, not foreign voices: Goyal on BTA with US – The Times of India

RAJKOT: Reliance Industries will double its investment in Gujarat to Rs 7 lakh crore, focussing on clean energy, a bold push in artificial intelligence (AI) and digital inclusion, sports infrastructure and social…

external.description: RAJKOT: Reliance Industries will double its investment in Gujarat to Rs 7 lakh crore, focussing on clean energy, a bold push in artificial intelligence (AI) and digital inclusion, sports infrastructure and social development. RIL CMD Mukesh Ambani announced Sunday that the group will pioneer India's AI push by setting up the country's largest AI-ready data centre in Jamnagar and Jio will launch a "people-first intelligence platform", built in India for domestic and global users, enabling citizens-starting from Gujarat-to access AI tools in their own language on their personal devices for everyday productivity and efficiency.

record.text: This is not saying that "Gen AI is good", BTW. This is understanding the scale of things and understanding that an individual doing it on their own is NOT the same as a whole corporation replacing an entire department with Gen AI.

If an artist creates their own Gen AI and feeds it with their own artwork, it is not the same as someone using Grok.
Is it still a bit lazy? I guess it is if they use it, and only it, to make new "art".

Gonna ruffle some feathers here...
But if Gen AI and LLMs are using information that is freely given to them WITH PERMISSION, I don't see a problem with them.
Let's say a writer is also a coder, and puts their own writings into their own model.
That's not the same as ChatGPT.

value.text:
新キャラクター公開します。　
「紅き魔女」セラ　28歳
人間社会では紅月(あかつき)セラ

魔女としての真名はセラフィナ･ブラッドムーン

昼間は都内企業で働くOL、夜は現代魔法ギルド「アーク・カヴン」所属の魔女として深紅の魔女装束に身を包み、街の夜を見守る。
主に都市結界の修復、呪いの解除、怪異の鎮圧を担当し直接戦闘よりも「封印・契約・調停」を得意としています。

ALTに現代魔法ギルド『アーク･カヴン』に関する設定などを置いています。
#DaysAI #AIイラスト #ChatGPT #うちの子 #セラ

images.alt:
現代魔法ギルド
アーク・カヴン（Arc Coven）

基本概要
	•	正式名称：現代魔法統制・調停機関《アーク・カヴン》
	•	設立：明治末期（近代化と魔法社会の衝突をきっかけに誕生）
	•	拠点：東京地下に存在する不可視結界都市「アーク・ネクサス」
	•	立場：
	•	国家からは「存在しない組織」
	•	魔法界では事実上の最高統治・調停機関

⸻

設立理念

「魔法を隠すのではなく、制御し、共存させる」

かつて魔女・陰陽師・錬金術師たちは各地で独立して活動していたが、
近代都市化により
	•	魔法事故の増加
	•	一般人への被害
	•	魔法の露見リスク

が深刻化。
それらを防ぐため、各流派の代表が集い設立されたのがアーク・カヴン。

組織構成

◆ 上位評議会（ハイ・カヴン）
	•	ギルドの最高意思決定機関
	•	各魔法系統の長老・当主クラスが名を連ねる
	•	紅月家も過去に議席を持っていた名門

⸻

◆ 実働部隊（フィールド・カヴン）

街で実際に活動する魔女・魔術師たち。

ランク制度
	•	Sランク：都市級・災厄級対応（伝説級）
	•	Aランク：単独で都市を守れる実力者
→ 紅月セラはここ
	•	Bランク：チーム運用の主力
	•	Cランク：新人・補助要員

⸻

◆ 管理・研究部門
	•	魔導具の開発
	•	結界の維持
	•	魔法犯罪の分析
	•	魔女の戸籍管理（表の身分もここが管理）

セラのOLとしての身分も、ここで合法的に偽装・維持されている。

⸻

アーク・カヴンの役割

1. 都市結界の維持
	•	東京・横浜・大阪など主要都市には巨大結界が張られている
	•	セラは 東京西部エリアの副担当

⸻

2. 魔法トラブルの仲裁
	•	呪いの暴走
	•	使い魔の暴発
	•	魔女同士の抗争

「戦闘より調停」を基本方針とするが、
失敗した場合は容赦なく鎮圧。

⸻

3. 禁呪・禁術の監視
	•	血の魔法・魂の契約・時間干渉など
	•	紅月家の血統魔法は「制限付き許可」

このため、セラは常に監視対象でもある。

昼の顔（OL 紅月セラとして)
	•	眼鏡をかけた知的で落ち着いた女性
	•	仕事は有能、同僚からの信頼も厚い
	•	クールに見えるが、実は面倒見が良い

魔法ギルド「アーク・カヴン」では
	•	登録ランク：Aクラス魔女
	•	若手だが実績は豊富
	•	上層部からは将来を期待されている
	•	無断で単独行動しがちなのが問題視されている

背景設定

紅月家は、数百年にわたり現代社会の裏側で人知れず均衡を守ってきた由緒正しき魔女の家系。
魔法の存在が公になることを避けるため、代々「一般社会に溶け込むこと」が家訓とされている。

彼女はその家系の現当主候補。
魔力の資質は非常に高いが、本人は「普通の生活」にも強い未練を持っている。

record.text: This is a “there’s no more bus” situation.
Why don’t more teams just ask ChatGPT which players will be good. Are they stupid?

Different sport obviously, but everyone thought the Durant-Westbrook Thunder would
Inevitably be back.
Brings the energy in the kitchen too apparently
I want chatgpt to end it all mike. I can’t handle another ai nostalgia ad
Run the damn ball
I’m not scared of anyone, but I would have preferred not playing the Rams. Really not interested in Sean McVay against our defense.
Love that commercial that suggests that NFL scouts are using chatGPT to tell them which linebacker prospects have good leadership skills.

Cmon dude that is not a flag! 

Can’t protect the QB when he slides late like that.
If doctors can't even demonstrate that bit of conversational decency (which they frequently can't)??

When I worked for a major healthcare institution, we had this big deal AI training day where one of the exercises was to use ChatGPT to make sample MyChart messages from doctor's less rude. It was literally just inserting generic text like "Hi ____, thanks for reaching out about your concern."

value.text:
Two things:
This just shows me that doctors can’t have conversations with their patients, which is a whole other problem.

2. We’re literally making digital middlemen to stack on top middlemen in healthcare which is all going to add to the cost of healthcare.

Also, calling it: ClaudeMD(TM)
From the blog: www.anthropic.com/news/healthc...

images.alt:
When connected, Claude can summarize users’ medical history, explain test results in plain language, detect patterns across fitness and health metrics, and prepare questions for appointments. The aim is to make patients' conversations with doctors more productive, and to help users stay well-informed about their health.

These integrations are private by design. Users can choose exactly the information they share with Claude, must explicitly opt-in to enable access, and can disconnect or edit Claude’s permissions at any time. We do not use users’ health data to train models.

Claude is designed to include contextual disclaimers, acknowledge its uncertainty, and direct users to healthcare professionals for personalized guidance.

As an Eagles fan, we finished the season true to who we are. And it’s a relief.
I’m just so tired of all of these assholes getting to claim the mantle of Real Americans when I live in an America closer to our ideals than any of them

images.alt:
I am tired of being told that the only Real America is the conservative one, the one that is attempting to force its will onto the places that the people I care about live. We have spent a decade attempting to try to understand the "other side", the fraction of America that support things like this no matter what, in an attempt to have things make sense in a way that we can find satisfying, but the truth is that they're just assholes. They're people who are jealous of the nice places and ways of living that come with embracing other people, and because they can't argue against the results, they lie to each other about how we're secretly miserable and then set out into the places we call home to try to make us miserable.
These are sad, cowardly people who look to the force of the state to make them feel big.

The reality is that the places that they want to bring to heel are the places that represent the promise of America better than anywhere. I live in New York City, surrounded by the peoples of the world, and I am better off for it. It is a city where you can eat around the world without spending more than $3 to get there, a city where you interact with and begin to understand other people just by existing here. My dad thinks that's why conservatives hate it, that a simple ride on the subway is enough to dispel the lies about it that people have either been fed or have chosen to believe. I have no doubts that the terror that is stalking Minnesota will find its way here soon, and we will be ready for it. And Minnesota, the place that has been the target of their terror? They have come together to support each other, people upending their lives to not just protest, but to organize and prove that they're stronger than the people who are trying to break their spirit. It's a beautiful reminder of what this country can be.

We're taught as kids in Minnesota to be nice to each other, and to be kind and
welcoming. You help each other through the long winters, and you lend a hand when someone is needy. It's the America you see in Norman Rockwell paintings, it's still out there. All of the houses in the neighborhood I grew up in became empty nests long ago, and as the parents of my old neighborhood friends move out to smaller or warmer places, they are being filled with Somali families. I worry about all of them in this moment, but I hope that the terror will pass safely for them and they can ride their bikes to school over the big hill I used to scale. I hope they get to have as nice of a childhood that I had, with their parents calling them home for dinner by standing in the driveway and yelling. I hope they get to live in an America that cares for them. That's the
real America.

FEMARH (Fundação Estadual do Meio Ambiente e Recursos Hídricos) confirmed that its internal systems were compromised in an incident that disrupted digital operations. While authorities insist that critical data remained secure, the attack highlights the growing risks faced by government agencies as cybercrime escalates worldwide.

Kuroda recognized in them the ancestors of his own method:

• Melville gave him the oceanic field of immanence.

record.text:
I only paid one month at $20 to give it a try, but yeah I also had been using the Copilot OSS for a while. Its agentic mode was mediocre at best, even with Opus.

I'm coding because it's fun, and prompting makes it not fun for me. Tab-completion is useful to go faster, because you remain in control.

I might try out other coding agents in the near future, but yeah, it's been a wild, weird 3 weeks.

Going from a high distrust of AI agents, to planning how to build my entire software production around one tool, to ditching it completely after realising how much control I'd be waiving.

OSS 4 ever.
I am fully on Linux now though so there is even less chance I am allowing an agent to run anything.

I want to give the people making these tools some credit. Googles offerings are some of the worst on the table from what I can tell, Microsoft can suck dicks in hell but at least GitHub copilot actually kind of works and has yet to try deleting my repository.

images.alt:
Der Action-Manga »Ninja to Koroshiya no Futarigurashi« von Hamburger endet in Japan mit dem kommenden siebten Band und wird damit offiziell abgeschlossen.
Die Reihe läuft seit Februar 2021 im Comic Dengeki Daioh “g” Magazin von ASCII Media Works und umfasst aktuell sechs Bände.

📜 Beschreibung 》
Nach einer Reihe mieser Zufälle lebt die junge Ninja Satoko plötzlich mit der tödlichen Auftragskillerin Konoha unter einem Dach. Weil sie wegen eines Missverständnisses von ihrem Dorf gejagt wird, ist Satoko auf Konohas brutale Fähigkeiten angewiesen, um zu überleben. Konoha duldet sie allerdings nur, weil Satoko unfassbar gut darin ist, „aufzuräumen“ – zu Hause und nach Konohas Jobs.

Der Drama-Supernatural-Manga von Yukiko Aota endet mit der Ausgabe 4/2026 des Shonen Sunday S, die am 25. Februar 2026 in Japan erscheint.

value.text:
Hey, you! :)

Here: activisthandbook.org/wellbeing/ri..., has a link to a 56-pg field guide. And also, a giant freaking 486-pg book for medics.

Short one is closer to what you want. Relevant bit for pepper spray ⬇️

(RCAs) = Riot control agents AKA pepper spray (OC) and tear gas (CS and or CN).

images.alt:
Riot Control Agent Contamination

Riot control agents (RCAs) lachrymators like tear gas and pepper spray.

They are designed to temporarily incapacitate protesters.

42 Riot Control Agent Contamination
Signs and Symptoms
• Red, itching, tearing, or burning eyes
• Increased mucous production
• Inability to open eyes
• Burning skin
• Coughing and difficulty breathing
• Gagging and vomiting
• Asphyxiation or pulmonary edema (from tear gas in enclosed spaces)

Treatment
two drawings

(a) Opening a Patient’s Eye (b) Decontamination
Figure 12: RCA Treatment

• Remove the patient from the RCA

• Remove their contaminated clothing, especially from the face

• If their eyes are effected, remove their contact lenses

• Keep them from touching the affected body parts

• Encourage coughing and sneezing

• Flush the affected body part with water or saline:
– If a body part other than the eyes is covered with CR gas, brush it
away and avoid water

– Flush the eyes from a distance of 2–3cm for several minutes (fig. 12b)

• Do not use LAW, baby shampoo, milk, vinegar, citrus, oil, hydrogen
peroxide, or lidocaine to treat RCA

• Use refrigerant spray on skin after flushing

[page] 43

• Consider use of an inhaler (salbutamol)

• If the patient removed clothing or is wet, consider treating for hypothermia

• Clean their contact lenses if they plan on putting them back in

external.description:
- $UBER不是一個app，而是一個複雜且困難的營運公司
- 如果做一個app，就可以輕鬆割司機羊毛賺錢，大家怎麼不做？
- 事實上巨頭們都不買$UBER or $LYFT，就是因為這是髒活、爛活
- 這些營運的錢並不好賺，但是現在真讓Uber做起來了
- Robotaxi沒有讓叫車系統變得簡單了，因為Uber的營運從來不是難在司機
- 司機不需要管理，而且是最容易的部分，他們是自願來賺錢的
- Uber提供一個賺錢的管道，他們自己為求生計會遵守規定
- 乘客端才是最多事、最麻煩、最難管理的，這個AI開車也完全沒少
- 乘客毛病很多，人也是很難改變習慣，需求端的資訊其實很難擴散

- 每一塊都是一個很複雜的困難問題，需要不少人去做
- 為什麼我知道？因為我做過，不信當然沒關係

Vandaag is de sterfdag van Aaron Swartz, _The Internet’s Own Boy_ , waar ik bijna elk jaar aandacht aan geef. Zie 2025 | 2024 | 2023 | 2021 | 2019| 2018. Dat doe ik niet voor niks.

Aaron Swartz was een schrijver, programmeur, web-activist en politieke organisator. Hij was onder andere betrokken bij de ontwikkeling van het RSS-format, de ontwikkeling van de webschrijf-taal Markdown, mede-oprichter van Reddit en mede-oprichter van Creative Commons. Swartz kwam op 11 januari 2013 om het leven. Hij koos hier zelf voor. De exacte redenen zullen altijd onduidelijk blijven, al is zijn toenmalige vriendin er duidelijk over in een blogpost, Aaron was opgejaagd wild voor de Amerikaanse overheid door zijn activistische werk.

Elk jaar kijk ik op Aaron’s sterfdag “The Internet’s Own Boy” (Archive.org | Youtube), de documentaire over zijn leven. Om mezelf te blijven herinneren dat een open en vrij internet het waard is om voor op te blijven staan en voor te vechten. Vooral nu. Nog steeds.

En als je deze documentaire kijkt, neem dan direct Tegenlicht’s Error 404: Internet in Crisis mee.

> Het World Wide Web, ooit symbool van hoop en vrijheid, is 35 jaar later uitgegroeid tot een web van commerciële belangen, afhankelijkheid en desinformatie. Een aantal grote techbedrijven bepaalt wat we zien en doen, terwijl democratie en autonomie onder druk staan. VPRO Tegenlicht onderzoekt hoe het zo ver heeft kunnen komen én hoe we het internet weer van iedereen kunnen maken.

Ik blijf goede hoop houden dat we als maatschappij een vuist willen en kunnen maken tegen de praktijken van BigTech. Door alle geopolitieke ontwikkelingen, de situatie tussen de Verenigde Staten en Groenland, ik denk dat het moment dichterbij is dan ooit om nog onafhankelijker te zijn van de grootmachten.

Aaron Swartz was een activist, sinds jonge leeftijd. Ik denk vaak aan hem, ik vraag me af welke rol hij zou hebben op het internet van nu, wat hij van de AI ontwikkelingen zou vinden. Zou hij de trainingsdata openbaar kunnen maken van de grote LLM’s zoals hij deed in 2011? Toen openbaarde hij 4 miljoen academische artikelen uit de online JSTOR bibliotheek. Naar eigen zeggen omdat academisch onderzoek door publiek geld wordt gefinancierd en dus openbaar moet zijn. Het is daarom moreel onjuist om dit achter de betaalmuur van JSTOR te zetten, volgens Swartz. Lees zijn Wikipedia pagina om over hem te leren. De jongen ademde en leefde het internet.

Hij is en blijft The Internet’s Own Boy.

Nu kunnen wij het verschil maken. Echt waar. Sluit je aan bij initiatieven als Bits of Freedom, verdiep je in digitale soevereiniteit, volg mensen als Bert Hubert, kom naar de Digitale Fitheid meetup waar we geregeld over deze onderwerpen praten. Komende vrijdag laat ik je zien hoe je je fotobibliotheek in eigen beheer kunt houden in plaats van te vertrouwen op Apple, Microsoft of Google.
Loskomen van BigTech is niet eenvoudig, digitaal activisme is lastig en kan complex zijn. Maar het is allemaal niet onmogelijk. Dat liet Aaron zien. Hij liet zijn stem horen en droeg bij aan een open internet met zijn initiatieven.
external.title: Aaron Swartz - Het Internet is nog altijd in crisis
